entry.title: Naughty Pup
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,373Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 68

Summary: What a lot of people seemed to misunderstand about Kim Seungmin was that he usually didn't mean to be bad. A menace, yes. A tease, undoubtedly. A brat of the highest caliber, duh. Obviously. But bad? Absolutely not. Seungmin had never been called bad before.Until now.~Seungmin basked in the praise and affection for a few moments, finally feeling at peace within himself. He was just on the edge of that warm, floaty space Chan often took him to. He knew after they fucked he'd be feeling amazing.“Fuck me, please,” Seungmin pleaded.Chan kissed his neck. “Yeah? Want me to fuck you hard? Choke you and breed you until you're just a dumb pup?”
